Review Text: A lovely place! Friendly environment, live music with two really nice musicians and delicious food!

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: This is the kind of restaurant that all restaurants should be like - it serves as a community gathering place and feels like home. Extremely friendly and hard working owners represent the new blended Dutch/International culture that makes Amsterdam so vibrant.

Name: Drovers dog

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: This place is the brunch spot you want to take your friends to, because no one else knows about it. Well, not that true, but it's definitely less crowded than a lot of other brunch places in Amsterdam. The prices are the same as many other ‚Ä¶

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Lovely, warm and welcoming place. Made the salad to our liking, and all with a smile! would definitely recommend!

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Such great food and amazing interior design, but hands down THE worst ‚Äòservice‚Äô I‚Äôve ever experienced. Actually one of the rudest people I‚Äôve ever met even outside the service industry, just in general. ‚Ä¶

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: The food was great but my flat white never arrived after more than one hour.  Service was a bit iffy and the place not very tidy or clean. Maybe severely understaffed, maybe Corona, maybe the wrong day... But this is no way to run a caf√©. Sorry.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Sat down for a coffee, end up staying more than three hours. Brought me right back to Aussie. Lovely terrace, friendly staff, good coffee, terrific eggs benedict. Seriously good vibes!

Review Text: The food here is genuinely great. Some main platea may be pricey but the quality has not dissapointed one bit. The kangaroo fillet with heavenly sweet potato is superb, as well as the hamburgers. Go ahead and get some desserts too.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Authentic Australian flavour! The restaurant is located in a quiet neighborhood, so a good place for people who wants to avoid overpriced food in the city centre.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: One of the favourite cafe/restaurants in oost. Good brunches, great coffee, nice variety of mains for dinner and very friendly and attentive staff. Love this place.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: We had a great time a Drovers dog. The staff were friendly, patient and accommodated a large and quite loud group at short notice. On to of this the service was super attentive and  food superb. Thanks for a great evening!

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Stylish designed Australian restaurant with nice food for breakfast/brunch. Dinner is good too, but not so many choices for vegetarians. Friendly staff. On a sunny day, this place will be perfect for breakfast/lunch. If you're looking for something special, you should give this restaurant a try.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Perfect compact but wide range of beers, wines, and cocktails. Oz themed with all day service. Very comfortable space with a range of tables and benches. Excellent obliging and cheerful staff make guests feel welcome and at home. Inventive ‚Ä¶

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: This Aussie restaurant has wonderful food and great service.   If you've ever wanted to try something different then this is the place to go.  They also had some delicious in house made deserts!  I would go back again the next time I'm in Amsterdam!

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Never ever disappointed with this choice. Chilled atmosphere, with nice little terrace & big indoor, good selection also for vegetarians. Top choice are eggs Benedict but beetroot burger is equally tasty. If you want to be healthy, defo go for apple-carrot-ginger smoothie, and they love dogs so.. 100% recommended

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Really great food, especially the brunch, and the service is always super friendly

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Great food, atmosphere, price. Couldn't really ask for anything better

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: One of the favourite cafe/restaurants in oost. Good brunches, great coffee, nice variety of mains for dinner and very friendly and attentive staff. Love this place.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: The Drovers Dog Atjehstraat is located in a more remote part of the city. It is therefore a nice and quit place to recharge. The food is good but nothing special I would say. Especially for the prices that they charge. Service is good too.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Friendly staff, often understaffed though. Quality of food is inconsistent, sometimes great, sometimes flat out disappointing. Little change in their menu despite Fish from the market (half of the time they don't have it) and Seasonal soup ‚Ä¶

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Great vibe. The owners and the staff are super friendly and welcoming. I believe the focus is on meat based dishes, but they also have vegetarian and vegan options on the menu.

Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Just off beaten path is this little gem, with amazing food and great atmosphere. Name: Drovers dog
Review Text: Very tasty veggie burger. I've also took the pan-fried halloumi for starter. Very good too. Nice and quiet location. They have sits outside.
